original_title: Jnani: The Silent Sage of Arunachala
overview: The life and teachings of Sri Ramana Maharshi, the man regarded by many as the greatest spiritual master of modern times. His teachings, all of which lead to self knowledge, are clearly explained by foremost experts and writers on the sage's philosophy, such as David Godman, Michael James and Sri V. Ganesan, the great-nephew of Sri Ramana Maharshi.
tagline: The only way out is within.
title: Jnani: The Silent Sage of Arunachala
